Description.Text: Hotel Osumi has 8 totally new rooms: Their furnishing is modern, but, at the same time, warm and relaxing. The comfortable hotel rooms are supplied with air conditioning, bathroom, shower, mini-bar and TV. Facilities: Air Conditioning, Free Wireless Internet Connection, ADSL Internet Corner at the reception, Breakfast Included, Mini Bar, Tables.

A characteristic Berati house in the neighborhood of Mangalem, the historical center of the city, is masterfully transformed into a hotel. Hotel Osumi combines the old tradition of the historic town with the new and the modern.
